# <a name="add-a-holiday-calendar-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="a370a-102">Outlook.com içinde bir tatil Takvim Ekle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a370a-102">Add a holiday calendar in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="a370a-103">Sayfanın alt kısmında, takvim simgesini seçin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a370a-103">At the bottom of the page, select the calendar icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="a370a-104">[Takvime git](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar)için.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a370a-104">to [go to Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="a370a-105">Sol bölmede, **Takvim Ekle**seçin > **İlginç takvimler** > **tatil**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a370a-105">In the left pane, select **Add calendar** > **Interesting Calendars** > **Holidays**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="a370a-106">İstediğiniz ve seçiminizi kaydetmek ve **Takvim Ekle** penceresini kapatmak için üst köşedeki **X** seçin tatil takvimi seçin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a370a-106">Select the holiday calendar you want and then select **X** in the top corner to save your choice and close the **Add calendar** window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a370a-107">[Doğum günü ve Tatil takvimleri kaldırma veya ekleme](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)hakkında bilgi edinin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a370a-107">Learn more about [adding or removing birthday and holiday calendars](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
